Castle Hotel
8 Very good
Based on 145 reviews

I would stay here again in a heartbeat. The room was clean and comfy, the staff were lovely and the breakfast was great.

Walking distance from everywhere. Don't hesitate to stay here.

Show more
Geraldine Bougourd , United Kingdom
Ashling Hotel
8.7 Excellent
Based on 137 reviews

The hotel was perfectly located about 15 minutes walk from the temple bar area. You could jump on the tram and the stop what right outside the hotel.

The hotel was beautiful and clean and the staff was just as good too. Me and my partner loved our time at the hotel and Dublin in general. It's a fantastic place and we would love to go back there one day in the future and would use the ashling hotel again! The Guinness factory is a must!

Show more
Bradley Cooke , United Kingdom
Temple Bar Inn
8.8 Excellent
Based on 29 reviews

Previously booked this hotel before and had a great time and the second booking was just as good. The hotel is clean, spacious and the location is fabulous! We will be returning again!

Joanne Lane , United Kingdom
Radisson SAS Royal Hotel Dublin
9 Excellent
Based on 17 reviews

Clarion Hotel Dublin Liffey Valley
7.4 Very good
Based on 12 reviews

Maldron Hotel Parnell Square
8.5 Excellent
Based on 52 reviews

The hotel was nice and clean,the staff was very helpful and the rooms were comfortable. Our 3 rooms had nice big bathrooms.

10 minutes walk and you are in Henry Street (Shopping area). We were a family og 5 persons and nobody had anything to grumble about.

Show more
Johannesen Gerd Patricia , Norway
Maldron Hotel Dublin Airport
8.6 Excellent
Based on 72 reviews

Comfortable and friendly. Food good. Cleanliness better than most.

Mrs M Hutchinson , United Kingdom
Jurys Inn Dublin Parnell Street
8.1 Excellent
Based on 110 reviews

For price i paid 80 pounds excellent but looking at prices closer to my departure date allmost 200pounds not worth that.

I had an excellent stay and would stay again at the right price

Show more
IAN DISLEY , United Kingdom
Mercantile Hotel
7.1 Very good
Based on 44 reviews

Fantastic ! Nice room, nice staff , good bar, great location.

Marc Duane , Ireland
The Royal Marine Hotel
8.7 Excellent
Based on 46 reviews

We can highly recommend it. High standard, super location, have all you need. This place is for folks that want to relax and enjoy.

Everything you need is outside the door, airport bus stop eash hour outsid the hotel. train to Dublin tak 20 min and are just around the corner. Nice places to have a long walk. Best hotel we stayed at for a long time. Shall come back here again shall miss it.

Show more
Michael Wallenberg , Sweden
Riverhouse Hotel
6.6 Good
Based on 15 reviews

Portobello Hotel
8.2 Excellent
Based on 37 reviews

Great hotel! Great staff! Great Food! The hotel is on a great location, nearby Stephen's Street and Rathmines.

City Centre is a 25min walk. Breakfast was great too! Staff were very friendly and helpful! I also love the complementary biscuits especially the chocolate ones.

Show more
Jan Benedict Cruz , Philippines
The Fitzwilliam Hotel
9.3 Exceptional
Based on 15 reviews

Dublin Hilton Hotel
8.2 Excellent
Based on 52 reviews

Our stay in this hotel was wonderful as it felt like a real oasis in a big city. The room was huge and so was the bathroom.

It had a real feeling of luxury to it.I can't comment on the location suitability for shopping or nightlife as we stayed for such a short overnight stay. The front desk staff could have been a bit more friendly/smiley. Overall, our experience was a good one.

Show more
Jeff Heywood , Australia
The Morgan Hotel
7.6 Very good
Based on 13 reviews

Radisson Blu Hotel and Spa Galway
8.5 Excellent
Based on 21 reviews

Great stay at the Radisson. Staff were very attentive and friendly. Check in/out was fast and painless.

Rooms were very clean and beds were so comfortable. The hotel is right beside the bus station. Its about a ten minute walk to the main shopping/bar street, so the hotel is not bang in the center, but is a very safe and easy walk. The leisure center is lovely, again very clean. Only thing I could fault was charging €3 for a swimming hat. Gorg outdoor hot tub. Residents bar after hours. Slightly pricey per night, but I would go back for sure.

Show more
MELISSA ROONEY , Ireland
Drury Court Hotel
8.4 Excellent
Based on 53 reviews

Our stay at the Drury Hotel was lovely. There is an Irish Breakfast served daily, and the rooms are clean and the service is terrific.

We found the Hotel situated in a great location near a large Shopping Centre 'Stephen's Green', 'Theatre', Cafe's and Restaurant's. It was only a short walk to the Postal Office and Tour Booking Office. We would definitely stay again at the Drury Court Hotel.

Show more
Kerrie Mouat , Australia
The Ripley Court Hotel
7.5 Very good
Based on 166 reviews

this hotel has a really good location and reasonable price. it's close to the connolly station and also o'connell street.

lots of restaurant here too.

Show more
Teeranai Sakulchit , Thailand
White Sands Hotel
8.1 Excellent
Based on 44 reviews

Lovely really enjoyed it

Fidel Visaya , United Kingdom
Clayton Hotel, Dublin Airport
8.1 Excellent
Based on 84 reviews

Very nice staff. very proffessional. room was lovely . plenty of tea and coffee for a weary traveller.

Meal in restaurant was also great. Sad it was only for 1 night. would book again

Show more
jean mcconnell , Australia
Radisson Blu Hotel Dublin Airport
8 Very good
Based on 47 reviews

great stay at the radisson blue dublin. good spacious rooms with great options in the restaurant. the airport is walking distance if you do not have big bags: they have a free shuttle from the airport which is convenient.

great options to the city centre from the aiport: return tickets of euro 10.00!

Show more
debashish das , India
Trinity City Hotel
8.5 Excellent
Based on 63 reviews

Very nice, very convenient, great breakfast. Very nice, very convenient, great breakfast.

James Butler , United Kingdom
Longford Arms Hotel
7.1 Very good
Based on 3 reviews

Hilton Garden Inn Dublin Custom House
8.7 Excellent
Based on 59 reviews

Very pleasant enjoyable stay. Friendly staff, comfortable room and excellent breakfast. We would certainly recommend this hotel and hope to return soon.

Mary O Hare , Ireland
Academy Plaza Hotel
8.1 Excellent
Based on 30 reviews

great location close to everything with helpful staff the food was good too, we spent a lot of time in the hotel as we were exhausted from travelling lovely room and comfortable bed.

Show more

Beresford Hotel

Eliza Lodge Guesthouse

Staunton's on the Green
7.8 Very good
Based on 46 reviews

My stay at the hotel was comfortable, staff very helpful, the light bulb in bedroom needed replacing and the curtain hooks not hooked to curtain rail, both were fixed while I was out for a few hours.

the only problem was the cooked breakfast, the tomatoes was not grilled as on menu and I asked for sausage and not received. I would stay at the hotel again.

More about Ireland

Ireland has long been on the list of top destinations to visit in Europe. Agoda.com offers the best prices for hotels in Ireland, with 4044 hotels ready for instant reservation via our secure online booking engine. While you're there, be sure to explore the different regions, including Clare, Cork, Galway. The country offers 385 unique cities to discover such as Dublin, Cork, Galway. Agoda.com offers a great range of irresistible hotel deals. Feel free to browse through our numerous hotels for the best online rates.

The room was clean and comfy, the staff were lovely and the breakfast was great. Walking distance from everywhere. Don't hesitate to stay here. Show more Geraldine Bougourd , United Kingdom Ashling Hotel 8.7 Excellent Based on 137 reviews The hotel was perfectly located about 15 minutes walk from the temple bar area. You could jump on the tram and the stop what right outside the hotel. The hotel was beautiful and clean and the staff was just as good too. Me and my partner loved our time at the hotel and Dublin in general. It's a fantastic place and we would love to go back there one day in the future and would use the ashling hotel again! The Guinness factory is a must! Show more Bradley Cooke , United Kingdom Temple Bar Inn 8.8 Excellent Based on 29 reviews Previously booked this hotel before and had a great time and the second booking was just as good. The hotel is clean, spacious and the location is fabulous! We will be returning again! Joanne Lane , United Kingdom Radisson SAS Royal Hotel Dublin 9 Excellent Based on 17 reviews Clarion Hotel Dublin Liffey Valley 7.4 Very good Based on 12 reviews Maldron Hotel Parnell Square 8.5 Excellent Based on 52 reviews The hotel was nice and clean,the staff was very helpful and the rooms were comfortable. Our 3 rooms had nice big bathrooms. 10 minutes walk and you are in Henry Street (Shopping area). We were a family og 5 persons and nobody had anything to grumble about. Show more Johannesen Gerd Patricia , Norway Maldron Hotel Dublin Airport 8.6 Excellent Based on 72 reviews Comfortable and friendly. Food good. Cleanliness better than most. Mrs M Hutchinson , United Kingdom Jurys Inn Dublin Parnell Street 8.1 Excellent Based on 110 reviews For price i paid 80 pounds excellent but looking at prices closer to my departure date allmost 200pounds not worth that. I had an excellent stay and would stay again at the right price Show more IAN DISLEY , United Kingdom Mercantile Hotel 7.1 Very good Based on 44 reviews Fantastic ! Nice room, nice staff , good bar, great location. Marc Duane , Ireland The Royal Marine Hotel 8.7 Excellent Based on 46 reviews We can highly recommend it. High standard, super location, have all you need. This place is for folks that want to relax and enjoy. Everything you need is outside the door, airport bus stop eash hour outsid the hotel. train to Dublin tak 20 min and are just around the corner. Nice places to have a long walk. Best hotel we stayed at for a long time. Shall come back here again shall miss it. Show more Michael Wallenberg , Sweden Riverhouse Hotel 6.6 Good Based on 15 reviews Portobello Hotel 8.2 Excellent Based on 37 reviews Great hotel! Great staff! Great Food! The hotel is on a great location, nearby Stephen's Street and Rathmines. City Centre is a 25min walk. Breakfast was great too! Staff were very friendly and helpful! I also love the complementary biscuits especially the chocolate ones. Show more Jan Benedict Cruz , Philippines The Fitzwilliam Hotel 9.3 Exceptional Based on 15 reviews Dublin Hilton Hotel 8.2 Excellent Based on 52 reviews Our stay in this hotel was wonderful as it felt like a real oasis in a big city. The room was huge and so was the bathroom. It had a real feeling of luxury to it.I can't comment on the location suitability for shopping or nightlife as we stayed for such a short overnight stay. The front desk staff could have been a bit more friendly/smiley. Overall, our experience was a good one. Show more Jeff Heywood , Australia The Morgan Hotel 7.6 Very good Based on 13 reviews Radisson Blu Hotel and Spa Galway 8.5 Excellent Based on 21 reviews Great stay at the Radisson. Staff were very attentive and friendly. Check in/out was fast and painless. Rooms were very clean and beds were so comfortable. The hotel is right beside the bus station. Its about a ten minute walk to the main shopping/bar street, so the hotel is not bang in the center, but is a very safe and easy walk. The leisure center is lovely, again very clean. Only thing I could fault was charging €3 for a swimming hat. Gorg outdoor hot tub. Residents bar after hours. Slightly pricey per night, but I would go back for sure. Show more MELISSA ROONEY , Ireland Drury Court Hotel 8.4 Excellent Based on 53 reviews Our stay at the Drury Hotel was lovely. There is an Irish Breakfast served daily, and the rooms are clean and the service is terrific. We found the Hotel situated in a great location near a large Shopping Centre 'Stephen's Green', 'Theatre', Cafe's and Restaurant's. It was only a short walk to the Postal Office and Tour Booking Office. We would definitely stay again at the Drury Court Hotel. Show more Kerrie Mouat , Australia The Ripley Court Hotel 7.5 Very good Based on 166 reviews this hotel has a really good location and reasonable price. it's close to the connolly station and also o'connell street. lots of restaurant here too. Show more Teeranai Sakulchit , Thailand White Sands Hotel 8.1 Excellent Based on 44 reviews Lovely really enjoyed it Fidel Visaya , United Kingdom Clayton Hotel, Dublin Airport 8.1 Excellent Based on 84 reviews Very nice staff. very proffessional. room was lovely . plenty of tea and coffee for a weary traveller. Meal in restaurant was also great. Sad it was only for 1 night. would book again Show more jean mcconnell , Australia Radisson Blu Hotel Dublin Airport 8 Very good Based on 47 reviews great stay at the radisson blue dublin. good spacious rooms with great options in the restaurant. the airport is walking distance if you do not have big bags: they have a free shuttle from the airport which is convenient. great options to the city centre from the aiport: return tickets of euro 10.00! Show more debashish das , India Trinity City Hotel 8.5 Excellent Based on 63 reviews Very nice, very convenient, great breakfast. Very nice, very convenient, great breakfast. James Butler , United Kingdom Longford Arms Hotel 7.1 Very good Based on 3 reviews Hilton Garden Inn Dublin Custom House 8.7 Excellent Based on 59 reviews Very pleasant enjoyable stay. Friendly staff, comfortable room and excellent breakfast. We would certainly recommend this hotel and hope to return soon. Mary O Hare , Ireland Academy Plaza Hotel 8.1 Excellent Based on 30 reviews great location close to everything with helpful staff the food was good too, we spent a lot of time in the hotel as we were exhausted from travelling lovely room and comfortable bed. Show more Rebecca Boltje , Australia Beresford Hotel 7.4 Very good Based on 15 reviews Hotel St. George by theKeycollection.ie 6.4 Good Based on 1 reviews Arlington Hotel O'Connell Bridge 8 Very good Based on 35 reviews Great place to be in Dublin. Enjoyed the meal and show. Peter Siegman , Australia Clarion Collection The Montenotte Hotel Cork 8.4 Excellent Based on 11 reviews O'Callaghan Stephens Green Hotel 8.5 Excellent Based on 8 reviews Moyvalley Hotel & Golf Resort 9.2 Exceptional Based on 2 reviews The Europe Hotel & Resort 9.8 Exceptional Based on 3 reviews East Clare Golf Village by Diamond Resorts 8.9 Excellent Based on 11 reviews Trump International Golf Links & Hotel Doonbeg Ireland 9.1 Exceptional Based on 227 reviews Adare Manor Hotel & Golf Resort 9.4 Exceptional Based on 30 reviews Liss Ard Estate 9.6 Exceptional Based on 1 reviews Mount Juliet Lodges 9.8 Exceptional Based on 5 reviews Fota Island Hotel and Spa 9.2 Exceptional Based on 2 reviews Kenmare Bay Hotel Lodges 9.2 Exceptional Based on 167 reviews Seafield Golf & Spa Hotel 8.7 Excellent Based on 3 reviews Delphi Resort Hotel & Spa 8.5 Excellent Based on 301 reviews Waterford Castle Hotel & Golf Resort 9.3 Exceptional Based on 1 reviews Wolseley Holiday Homes at Mount Wolseley Hotel, Spa & Country Club 8.1 Excellent Based on 17 reviews Amberley House 8.4 Excellent Based on 36 reviews We had a really great stay! Rooms were clean, people friendly, breakfast British but opulent - All important scenery of Dublin within walking distance! Very recommendable! Frank Werner , Germany Clifden House 7.7 Very good Based on 17 reviews Eliza Lodge Guesthouse 8.5 Excellent Based on 17 reviews Staunton's on the Green 7.8 Very good Based on 46 reviews My stay at the hotel was comfortable, staff very helpful, the light bulb in bedroom needed replacing and the curtain hooks not hooked to curtain rail, both were fixed while I was out for a few hours. the only problem was the cooked breakfast, the tomatoes was not grilled as on menu and I asked for sausage and not received. I would stay at the hotel again. Show more Barbara Diaz , United Kingdom Amber Lodge Guest House 7.4 Very good Based on 4 reviews The Charles Stewart Guesthouse 7.3 Very good Based on 52 reviews I was only there for a very quick overnight stay, but the staff very so lonley!!! The room was so neat and cosy! Great location, would consider staying here again in the future and recommend to friends. Natasha Forster , Australia Dublin Airport Manor by theKeycollection 8.2 Excellent Based on 8 reviews SIDC Serviced & Budget Rooms (Rathmines & North Strand) 6.1 Good Based on 3 reviews Celtic Lodge Guesthouse – Restaurant & Bar 7.9 Very good Based on 18 reviews Glenogra Townhouse 9.1 Exceptional Based on 2 reviews Albany House 7.7 Very good Based on 7 reviews Rusheen Bay House 8.6 Excellent Based on 30 reviews Easy to find. Close to quay street but quite.
